product_name: Merrell Moab Ventilator Mid Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: These highly breathable Merrell(R) Moab Ventilator mid-height light hikers work hard on all your active warm-weather endeavors. Dura leather/nylon ventilator mesh uppers offer ample breathability, flexibility and support for long-lasting performance. Protective synthetic leather toe bumpers ensure durability and abrasion-resistance; heel loops aid entry. Mesh padded tongue protects instep against lace pressure without inhibiting breathability. Nylon mesh linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for more comfortable feet in hot conditions. Removable 4.5mm footbeds are anatomically shaped and add cushioning for improved comfort. Q-Form- alignment system provides women with a precise anatomic fit for superb, tailored comfort. Full-length, compression-molded EVA midsoles supply cushioning and support for all-day wear. Air Cushion(R) heel pockets provide extra shock-absorption under heels and help stabilize footstrike. Nylon arch shanks provide extra stability and support. Vibram(R) Multi-Sport(TM) outsoles with Trek and Super Trek rubber deliver reliable traction on both wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: These highly breathable Merrell(R) Moab Ventilator mid-height light hikers work hard on all your active warm-weather endeavors.
